45071.name: Statistical Capacity Indicator (World Bank)
45071.description: The Statistical Capacity Indicator provides an overview of the capacity of a country's national statistical system based on a diagnostic framework thereby assessing three dimensions: Methodology, Source Data, and Periodicity and Timeliness.
45071.datasetName: Statistical Capacity Indicator (SCI) - World Bank Data on Statistical Capacity
45071.s_name: Statistical Capacity Indicator - World Bank Data on Statistical Capacity

source.name: Statistical Capacity Indicator - World Bank Data on Statistical Capacity
source.dataPublishedBy: World Bank Data on Statistical Capacity
source.additionalInfo:
Definitions and characteristics of countries and other territories: https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/bbsc/BBSC_Country_info.xls
Statistical concept and methodology:
The Statistical Capacity Indicator score is calculated as the average of the scores of the 3 dimensions, i.e. Availability, Collection, Practice.
